data.title: Memories of Leslie Toth
data.meta_description:
Toth, at St. Thomas Elgin General Hospital on Wednesday, April 28, 2010. 

Leslie Toth of R.R.2, Aylmer in his 89th year. Beloved husband of Isabel Toth. Dear father of Les Toth and Jarmila Pazitny of London and Larry Toth and wife Bonnie of Surrey, British Columbia. Former father-in-law of Louise Toth. Loving grandfather of Suzanne Toth and husband Ryan Kinsey, Michael, Mark, Andrew, Brad and Bryan and great grandfather of Brennan and Travis. Predeceased by an infant son Robert Toth(1955), sisters Mary Fajcz and Irene Borda Martaens. Born in Zalaszent Hungary on April 19, 1922 son of the late Joseph and Mary (Gyuricza) Toth. Les was a tobacco farmer. He operated L.&L. Satalite T.V. and Toth Volume Gun Irrigation. Friends may call at the H. A. Kebbel Funeral Home, Aylmer on Friday 2-4 and 7-9 p.m. where the funeral service will be held on Saturday, May 1, 2010 at 11:00 am. Interment, Aylmer Cemetery. Rev. Norman Jones, officiating. Donations to the St. Thomas Elgin General Hospital Foundation would be appreciated. Condolences can be expressed at kebbelfuneralhome.com
